New Records: Dylan Crews became the 10th Nats' rookie to have at least two extra-base hits and a stolen base in one game
Key Match Events: The Nationals swept the Pirates in a doubleheader with a dramatic 9th inning finish, scoring four runs against Aroldis Chapman
Pre-Game Insights: The Nationals were underdogs with a +135 moneyline and needed to win 8 of their remaining 20 games to exceed their projected win total
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Martinez praised the team's resilience and preparation for the upcoming game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nationals' bullpen threw 165 pitches, showing their fatigue from previous games; The team's starting pitchers had a combined ERA of 4.44
Others: The Nationals were in second place in the NL East and had a 58-104 projected win total
